snippet: The social network, which gets relatively modest traffic, has remained valuable to Google because of the broad view it can give advertisers of people’s activity and interests.
abstract: Google Plus, social network that receives only moderate traffic, is extremely valuable to company by allowing it to gather an ever-richer trove of the personal information that advertisers covet; signing up for Plus allows Google access to a user's behavior across all of its services, even if the social network itself is never used.
lead_paragraph: The social network, which gets relatively modest traffic, has remained valuable to Google because of the broad view it can give advertisers of people’s activity and interests.

headline.main: The Plus in Google Plus? It’s Mostly for Google
headline.print_headline: The Plus in Google Plus? It’s Mostly for Google
